title: Benjamin Rivers - Snow (Complete eBook Edition)
description:
Snow: Complete eBook Edition

Benjamin Rivers

Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0, 2014, 164 pages

What do you do when your whole world turns upside down?

Dana is a woman who doesn't deal well with confrontation. She likes her job, her friends, and the cozy comfort of her neighborhood Ã¢â‚¬â€ Toronto's own Queen Street West. But when the world forces her to stand up, will she be able to handle it?

SNOW is a unique graphic novel entirely set in Toronto's Queen Street West neighborhood. It was nominated for a Joe Shuster Gene Day Award and was awarded a Xeric Foundation grant in for its production.
